channel.title: Commands
channel.description: HELLO GUYS!!! I NEED HELP FOR COMMANDS CAN SOME1 GIVE ME A EXAMPLE AND WHERE DO I ADD THEM? IM NEW TO CODEING SORRY!

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @br0nz3_pk3r br0nz3 pk3r
item.description:
@br0nz3_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:8, topic:363502”].startsWith means if the command starts with “gold” so like you can do “goldjdkfhjkdh” and it will still work, cuz it starts with gold. But if you do .equalsIgnoreCase, you must do “gold”, “goldfkjghdfj” wouldn’t work, cuz it doesn’t say “gold”, it says “goldfkjghdfj”.

When you said it didn’t work, you need to compile and then restart your server.[/quote]i compiled didnt restart sec

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

.startsWith means if the command starts with “gold” so like you can do “goldjdkfhjkdh” and it will still work, cuz it starts with gold. But if you do .equalsIgnoreCase, you must do “gold”, “goldfkjghdfj” wouldn’t work, cuz it doesn’t say “gold”, it says “goldfkjghdfj”.

When you said it didn’t work, you need to compile and then restart your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @br0nz3_pk3r br0nz3 pk3r
item.description:
@br0nz3_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:363502”]K.
In Client.java, search this:

	private void customCommand(String command) {

Underneath that, add this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gold")) { addItem(995, 100); }
What this does is that if the player’s command is ::gold, add 100 of the item, 995.
995 = coins.[/quote]ok thx n btw (command.??) does the words after command. have to be certain or can i just use equalsignorecase? and btw do i put a space under it then add or no?

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

K.
In Client.java, search this:

	private void customCommand(String command) {

Underneath that, add this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gold")) { addItem(995, 100); }
What this does is that if the player’s command is ::gold, add 100 of the item, 995.
995 = coins.

Read full topic
